entry.title: $2300 // AWESOME BUSHWICK! KING SIZE 1 BR * BACKYARD*FIRE SCAPE+KITCHEN WINDOWS
entry.content:
LARGE KING SIZE SUNNY BEDROOM!

-BACKYARD
-KITCHEN WINDOW
-FIRE SCAPE!

-NO FEE-
-GREAT PRICE-

NO APPLICATION FEE

PET FRIENDLY
AWESOME COMMUNITY

This is a beautiful large apartment located in a rated and busy Bushwick/East Williamsburg spot.
Spacious king size sunny bedroom facing east, bright and sunny kitchen facing west with windows and a fire scape! large refrigerator and gas stove. Railroad! The bedroom is separated from the kitchen by a hallway and living room. Bathroom with a window and a bathtub, hardwood floors, extra closet/storage, second floor.

Backyard! & Pet friendly
100% pest free!

Located at an awesome spot on Graham ave just few blocks from Broadway, Morgan ave & Manhattan ave. Awesome restaurants, cafes, bars and shops all over the place combined with the best artist's Bushwick vibe, convenient stores, banks, pharmacies, grocery stores within steps. Drop off laundry only 3 doors away!

Great reliable management
Near L, M, J, G Trains

EASY APPROVAL!

Contact soon for viewing

Catalina
show contact info

entry.title: $2200 // {1br 1 office} Studio Sublet, Feb 2019-March 2020 ($2200/month)
entry.content:
Hello!

Renting my one bedroom + one office (with futon) apartment from Feb 2019 - March 2020. I am flexible on your exact arrival & departure dates.

$2200/month, $500 deposit

The place is lovely and lived-in. It's not newly renovated, so it has its quirks, but it is fully functional and fully equipped:

~Kitchen with everything you need + Vitamix and in-house washing machine.
~Living room with a projector that connects to your laptop.
~A comfy bedroom around ~10x11 feet.
~A cozy office + futon around ~7x9 feet
~ AC/Central Heating
~ Wifi

Please note that the apartment is up a 4 story walk-up.

5m walk to Marcy J, 10m walk to Bedford L, 10m walk to Lorimer L/G.
Whole foods, local grocers, and many highly reviewed restaurants, bars, and yoga studios nearby :)

Feel free to email with questions or for more details/pics/to stop by/ etc.

Looking forward to hearing from you! :)
